sentences.sContent: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.sCn: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.sContent: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.sCn: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

trans.tranOther: used to show how far back in the past something happened
